version_description:
- New special character layout at the top
- Support of Bluetooth keyboards with shortcuts including Ctrl+C and Ctrl+V
- Enhanced support of custom keyboards such as Swype and SwiftKey
- Fixed problem with Alerts
- Various other minor fixes and

- Fixed an issue occurring on some iPhone 6+ devices with iOS 8.3 where part of the screen was black
- Fixed F8 key mapping
- New icons for arrow keys

- computers & contacts list
-- new layout
-- alerts and service cases are in their own view
-- new detail view for computers, contacts, and service cases
-- lots of usability improvements
-- stability and performance improvements
--
Minor improvements and fixes

· Fixed bug with two-factor authentication (TFA)
· Fixed bug when logging into Computers & Contacts list
· Other minor fixes and improvements

Fixes for iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus
· Toolbar can be opened again in remote control session (by clicking on the keyboard icon)
· “Tab to click” works again as expected

- Chat including profile pictures, push notifications, emojis, and much more
- Enhanced group sharing
- Faster file transfer
- Various other improvements and fixes

• 3D Touch - Home screen quick actions
• Easy access – Connect to your computer without password
• Clickable website links
• Copy & paste chat messages
• Possible to connect to TeamViewer 9 again
• Fixed crash when resuming app while ru

• Offline Chat
• Fixed crash when starting a remote control session
• Lots of fixes and improvements

- Fixed connection problems
- Other fixes, especially for low bandwidth connections

•Support for the iOS 9 multitasking feature Split View
•Various chat improvements
•Other fixes and improvements

Mobile to Mobile Remote Connections:
- Cross-platform, mobile-to-mobile remote control and screen sharing for Android, iOS, and Windows Phone.

- Cross-platform, mobile-to-mobile remote control and screen sharing for Android, iOS, and Windows Phone.

Mobile to Mobile Remote Connections:

• Offering In-App Purchases:
It is now possible to purchase a Business subscription including Mobile Device Support within the app.
• Fixed a bug which caused a crash during refresh of Computers & Contacts list

• Solved an issue which prevented the offline chat messages to be shown

• Connect to the TeamViewer Pilot app: Help others resolve any kind of equipment and machinery issue with AR based remote assistance.
• Minor improvements and fixes

• Solved an issue which caused the app to crash while connecting to older TeamViewer versions
• Solved an issue which prevented recognizing older licenses during mobile to mobile connections
• Minor improvements and fixes

• File transfer improvement:
- Connect tab allows to choose between remote control and file transfer
- It is now possible to transfer files from the Computers tab directly
- File transfer icon at the bottom is gone

Minor fixes and improvements

• New feature: It is now possible to search for Computers & Contacts within your account
• Solved an issue which prevented the use of Swiftpoint mice, a new setting is now available to activate it

- minor fixes and improvements

• iOS device support was added to event logging in TeamViewer. Starting/stopping a remote control session and creating/editing groups on an iOS device will now also be reported in the event logs.
• Minor fixes and improvements

• You can now remove a participant from a chat conversation
• You can now search for conversation names in chat
• Minor fixes and improvements

• You can now submit your feedback and provide your rating in the ‘’Settings’’ menu
• Fixed a bug in chat rooms search where "No matches found" appears even if results are retrieved
• Minor fixes and improvements

• Solved an issue which reverted the "Lock remote screen" setting to "Automatic" after an app restart
• Minor fixes and improvements

• Solutions tab is now available! More TeamViewer solutions are now available in one place within the app.
• Added User profile picture to the Settings menu.
• Added Split view support for the Settings menu on iPads.
• Minor fixes and improv

• Solved an issue which caused the app to take several seconds to be ready to connect.
